text:
Dev Ops, Mobile, Front End, Back End - Toronto / San Francisco / Remote

Top Hat Monocle

www.tophatmonocle.com

Come to Top Hat and solve Real Time, Large Scale problems. We are a venture backed and disrupting the education industry and want you to join us!

Great salary, stock, benefits, work from Toronto / San Francisco office, or if you are amazing you can work remotely.

* Front End Developer

JS, Backbone, HTML, HAML, CSS, SCSS

* Dev Ops

AWS, RabbitMQ

* Back end

Python, Django, C++

* Mobile

Android, iOS, Windows Phone

Contact kent@tophatmonocle.com for more details!
